lead_paragraph: Rio de Janeiro's mayor on Tuesday declared a fourth city holiday during the Olympic games after fans and athletes arrived to gridlock in the host city.

headline.print_headline: Rio Mayor Declares Fourth Holiday to Ease Olympics Traffic
headline.main: Rio Mayor Declares Fourth Holiday to Ease Olympics Traffic
